## LoadingProgressIndicatorGetStyleFunction type

Function returning loading indicator styles.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type LoadingProgressIndicatorGetStyleFunction = (attrs: {
    color: string;
    direction: "ltr" | "rtl";
    fadeAnimationDuration: number;
    growAnimationDuration: number;
    isVisible: boolean;
    progress: number;
}) => CSSProperties;
```

## Remarks

Called with attrs argument containing config and state values:

- 

- 

- 

- 

- isVisible (boolean)

- progress (number 0 and 1)

Function definition should be outside of render function or wrapped in useCallback to prevent unnecessary re-renders.
